short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add items from all your favorite stores to one universal gift list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Welcome to the one and only Indian Independent registry platform. Add your products from any ecommerce website and make a Wishlist. Share the list with your friends and make all your wishes come true
